subSections.title: Japanese
subSections.text: {{ja-kanji forms|獣|獸}}

subSections.title: Kanji
subSections.text: {{ja-kanji|grade=c|rs=犬12|kyu=獸}}

subSections.title: Readings
Etymology 1
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|けだもの|yomi=k}}
Literally "thing of hair". Compound of {{compound|ja|sort=けだもの|毛|tr1=ke|t1=hair|だ|tr2=da|pos2=genitive marker|物|tr3=mono|t3=thing}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref> Medial ''-da-'' is a very rare genitive marker found in compounds, also seen in {{m|ja|果物||tr=kudamono|fruit}}.

subSections.title: Pronunciation
subSections.text: {{ja-pron|yomi=k|けだもの|acc=0|acc_ref=NHK,DJR}}

subSections.title: Noun
Etymology 2
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|けもの|yomi=k}}
Literally "hair thing". Compound of {{compound|ja|sort=けもの|毛|tr1=ke|t1=hair|物|tr2=mono|t2=thing}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref>

subSections.title: Pronunciation
subSections.text: {{ja-pron|yomi=k|けもの|acc=0|acc_ref=NHK,DJR}}

subSections.title: Noun
Derived terms
Etymology 3
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|しし|yomi=irr}}
From {{m|ja|肉|tr=shishi||meat, flesh}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref>

subSections.title: Pronunciation
subSections.text: {{ja-pron|yomi=irr|しし|acc=1|acc_ref=DJR}}

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|しし}}

# {{lb|ja|archaic|sort=しし}} a [[beast]] {{qualifier|used for its meat, such as a [[boar]] or a [[deer]]}}
